snippet: A year after eight people were killed when a gas explosion leveled two buildings on Park Avenue, Mayor Bill de Blasio visited the site with the friends and families of the victims.
lead_paragraph: A year after eight people were killed when a gas explosion leveled two buildings on Park Avenue, Mayor Bill de Blasio visited the site with the friends and families of the victims.

headline.main: Mayor de Blasio Marks Anniversary of Fatal Explosion in East Harlem
